message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a slightly reduced cost. I believe this price reflects the significant value you will receive from the product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.
